name: crated labrador mutt
description: A Labrador Retriever in a crate.  You can put it in a kennel with another Labrador to try to breed puppies, cover it in armor, train it as an attack dog or release it from the crate.

use_action.friendly_msg: You release the dog from its crate.

name: crated armored labrador
description: An armored Labrador Retriever in a crate.  You can train it as an attack dog or release it from the crate.  You'll have to remove its armor to breed it.

use_action.friendly_msg: You release the dog from its crate.
